mapper.insert: insert into music(music_no, music_title, music_artist, music_album, music_play, release_time) values(#{musicNo}, #{musicTitle}, #{musicArtist}, #{musicAlbum}, #{musicPlay}, #{releaseTime})
mapper.update: update music set music_title=#{musicTitle}, music_artist=#{musicArtist}, music_album=#{musicAlbum}, release_time=#{releaseTime} where music_no=#{musicNO}
